refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Signals
refsect1.synopsis: "connection-error" : Run Last / Has Details "new-channel" : Run Last / Has Details "self-handle-changed" : Run Last / Has Details "status-changed" : Run Last / Has Details "channel-closed" : Run Last / Has Details "new-channels" : Run Last / Has Details "presences-changed" : Run Last / Has Details "presence-update" : Run Last / Has Details "avatar-retrieved" : Run Last / Has Details "avatar-updated" : Run Last / Has Details "aliases-changed" : Run Last / Has Details "capabilities-changed" : Run Last / Has Details

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These interfaces (auto-generated from the Telepathy spec) make it easier to export objects implementing the Telepathy Connection and its optional interfaces, with the correct method and signal signatures, and emit signals from those objects in a type-safe way.

refsect2.title: TpSvcConnection
refsect2.para: Dummy typedef representing any implementation of this interface.

refsect2.title: TpSvcConnectionClass
refsect2.para: The class of TpSvcConnection.
In a full implementation of this interface (i.e. all methods implemented), the interface initialization function used in G_IMPLEMENT_INTERFACE() would typically look like this:

refsect2.title: tp_svc_connection_connect_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method Connect on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Connection.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_connection_implement_connect ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the Connect method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the Connect D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_connection_return_from_connect ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.
